modName: Craftable Motor Tool Parts by Nosoren
modShortDescription: Adds a recipe that allows you to craft motor tools parts. Simple xml tweak, so it only needs to be installed serverside or host side for peer-to-peer.
modDescription:
Adds a [recipe](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-recipes/) that allows you to craft motor [tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) parts.

Simple xml tweak, so it only needs to be installed serverside or host side for peer-to-peer.

## Installation

Extract to you or your serverâ€™s 7DTD mods folder. Directories for mod folders should be /7 Days to Die/Mods/Name of Mod Folder/Mod Files.

If you are seeing two folders both with the name of the mod, you need to copy and paste the mod files/folders from the deeper folder and delete the second folder with the name of the mod so that you only see it once and then have the mod files.

**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/zfrgg5tzbsdo1mm/Craftable_Motor_Tool_Parts_by_Nosoren.zip/file)**

**Credits:** [Nosoren](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/nosoren/)
